parameters.content:
## Switch 1
According to the data fetched by web hook , this node segregates the workflow on the bases of updation type. It specifically deals with complete **deletion of user , creation of new user** or the case where **user is terminated** via a schedule (in hi bob ).

## Initial Web hook 
This web hook fetches data from hi bob automatically when an event ( marked for web hook activation ) is triggered.

## Get information about user
In here , we are trying to retrieve more data about the user as we got only employee id which is specific to hi bob in our web hook.

## Extracting required data
These node extract the data we specifically require and also are important for transforming data.

## Authentication 
this node deals with the authentication on our platform mindtickle pathshala. It uses API key and secret key to generate a bearer token which is further used in authentication.

## Authentication 
this node deals with the authentication on our platform mindtickle pathshala. It uses API key and secret key to generate a bearer token which is further used in authentication.

## Getting User (terminated) data
Here we are trying to fetch the data of a terminated user from hi bob **( especially email )** to use that in our HTTP request for termination in Mindtickle platform too.

## Deactivation of user on Mindtickle
using the email which we received in our previous node , we Deactivate the user on Mindtickle.

## Making date format digestible 
Here we are converting data format in *mm-dd-yyyy* format for us to pass the information of user creation date in our next node.

## User Creation on Mindtickle  
Now we pass all the gathered information in our HTTP request to create a user

## Switch 3
Just check if the data is present or did the data which we specifically needed is empty.

parameters.content:
## Authentication 
this node deals with the authentication on our platform mindtickle pathshala. It uses API key and secret key to generate a bearer token which is further used in authentication.

## Get information about user
In here , we are trying to retrieve more data about the user as we got only employee id which is specific to hi bob in our web hook.

## Making date format digestible 
Here we are converting data format in *mm-dd-yyyy* format for us to pass the information of user creation date in our next node.

## Get User id ( for params )
This node fetches the user id from minditickle site which is used in api request and helps target the intended user.

## Update User Information
Updates the information of the updated user.
